sentences.sContent: Bowls brimmed with fresh fruit, and gilt-edged religious books were everywhere.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bowls brimmed with fresh fruit, and gilt-edged religious books were everywhere.
sentences.sCn: 到处是装满新鲜水果的碗和烫金边的宗教书籍。

trans.tranOther: gilt-edged  stocks  or  shares  do not give you much  interest (= additional money )  but are considered very safe as they are sold mainly by governments
